contents.text: Description: The property value consists of textual contact information. An alternative representation for the property value can also be specified that refers to a URI pointing to an alternate form, such as a vCard [RFC 2426], for the contact information.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：属性值由文本联系信息组成。还可以指定属性值的替代表示形式，该表示形式引用指向联系信息的替代形式（例如vCard[RFC 2426]）的URI。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: contact = "CONTACT" contparam ":" text CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: contact=“contact”contparam:“文本CRLF”

contents.text:
contparam  = *(
           ; the following are optional,
           ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
(";" altrepparam) / (";" languageparam) /
; the following is optional, ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparam)
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”xparam）

contents.text: Example: The following is an example of this property referencing textual contact information:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是引用文本联系信息的此属性的示例：

contents.text: CONTACT:Jim Dolittle\, ABC Industries\, +1-919-555-1234
contents.zh-CHS: 联系人：吉姆·多利特尔\，ABC工业\，+1-919-555-1234

contents.text: The following is an example of this property with an alternate representation of a LDAP URI to a directory entry containing the contact information:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是此属性的一个示例，其中LDAP URI的另一种表示形式是包含联系人信息的目录条目：

contents.text:
CONTACT;ALTREP="ldap://host.com:6666/o=3DABC%20Industries\,
 c=3DUS??(cn=3DBJim%20Dolittle)":Jim Dolittle\, ABC Industries\,
 +1-919-555-1234
The following is an example of this property with an alternate representation of a MIME body part containing the contact information, such as a vCard [RFC 2426] embedded in a [MIME-DIR] content-type:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是此属性的一个示例，其中包含联系人信息的MIME正文部分的替代表示形式，例如嵌入[MIME-DIR]内容类型中的vCard[RFC 2426]：

contents.text:
CONTACT;ALTREP="CID=<part3.msg970930T083000SILVER@host.com>":Jim
  Dolittle\, ABC Industries\, +1-919-555-1234
The following is an example of this property referencing a network resource, such as a vCard [RFC 2426] object containing the contact information:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是引用网络资源的此属性的示例，例如包含联系人信息的vCard[RFC 2426]对象：

contents.text:
CONTACT;ALTREP="http://host.com/pdi/jdoe.vcf":Jim
  Dolittle\, ABC Industries\, +1-919-555-1234
4.8.4.3 Organizer
Property Name: ORGANIZER
contents.zh-CHS: 物业名称：组织者

contents.text: Purpose: The property defines the organizer for a calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：该属性定义日历组件的组织者。

contents.text: Value Type: CAL-ADDRESS
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：CAL-ADDRESS

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard, language, common name, directory entry reference, sent by property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准、语言、公用名、目录项引用、由属性参数发送。

contents.text: Conformance: This property MUST be specified in an iCalendar object that specifies a group scheduled calendar entity. This property MUST be specified in an iCalendar object that specifies the publication of a calendar user's busy time. This property MUST NOT be specified in an iCalendar object that specifies only a time zone definition or that defines calendar entities that are not group scheduled entities, but are entities only on a single user's calendar.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：必须在指定组计划日历实体的iCalendar对象中指定此属性。必须在指定日历用户繁忙时间发布的iCalendar对象中指定此属性。不得在仅指定时区定义的iCalendar对象中指定此属性，也不得在定义非组计划实体但仅在单个用户日历上的日历实体的iCalendar对象中指定此属性。

contents.text: Description: The property is specified within the "VEVENT", "VTODO", "VJOURNAL calendar components to specify the organizer of a group scheduled calendar entity. The property is specified within the "VFREEBUSY" calendar component to specify the calendar user requesting the free or busy time. When publishing a "VFREEBUSY" calendar component, the property is used to specify the calendar that the published busy time came from.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：该属性在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”、“VJOURAL”日历组件中指定，用于指定组计划日历实体的组织者。该属性在“VFREEBUSY”日历组件中指定，用于指定请求空闲或繁忙时间的日历用户。发布“VFREEBUSY”日历时“日历组件，该属性用于指定发布的繁忙时间来自的日历。

contents.text: The property has the property parameters CN, for specifying the common or display name associated with the "Organizer", DIR, for specifying a pointer to the directory information associated with the "Organizer", SENT-BY, for specifying another calendar user that is acting on behalf of the "Organizer". The non-standard parameters may also be specified on this property. If the LANGUAGE property parameter is specified, the identified language applies to the CN parameter value.
contents.zh-CHS: 该属性具有属性参数CN，用于指定与“组织者”相关联的公共或显示名称DIR，用于指定指向与“组织者”相关联的目录信息的指针SENT-BY，用于指定代表“组织者”行事的另一个日历用户。也可以在此属性上指定非标准参数。如果指定了LANGUAGE属性参数，则标识的语言将应用于CN参数值。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: organizer = "ORGANIZER" orgparam ":" cal-address CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: organizer=“orgparam”：“cal地址CRLF”

contents.text: orgparam   = *(
; the following are optional,
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的：，

contents.text: ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 但不得超过一次

contents.text:
(";" cnparam) / (";" dirparam) / (";" sentbyparam) /
(";" languageparam) /
; the following is optional, ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparam)
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”xparam）

contents.text: Example: The following is an example of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: ORGANIZER;CN=John Smith:MAILTO:jsmith@host1.com
The following is an example of this property with a pointer to the directory information associated with the organizer:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是此属性的示例，其中包含指向与组织者关联的目录信息的指针：

contents.text:
ORGANIZER;CN=JohnSmith;DIR="ldap://host.com:6666/o=3DDC%20Associ
 ates,c=3DUS??(cn=3DJohn%20Smith)":MAILTO:jsmith@host1.com

The following is an example of this property used by another calendar user who is acting on behalf of the organizer, with responses intended to be sent back to the organizer, not the other calendar user:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是代表组织者的其他日历用户使用的此属性的示例，其响应将发送回组织者，而不是其他日历用户：

contents.text:
ORGANIZER;SENT-BY="MAILTO:jane_doe@host.com":
 MAILTO:jsmith@host1.com
4.8.4.4 Recurrence ID
Property Name: RECURRENCE-ID
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：RECURRENCE-ID

contents.text: Purpose: This property is used in conjunction with the "UID" and "SEQUENCE" property to identify a specific instance of a recurring "VEVENT", "VTODO" or "VJOURNAL" calendar component. The property value is the effective value of the "DTSTART" property of the recurrence instance.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性与“UID”和“SEQUENCE”属性结合使用，以标识重复出现的“VEVENT”、“VTODO”或“VJOURNAL”日历组件的特定实例。属性值是递归实例的“DTSTART”属性的有效值。

contents.text: Value Type: The default value type for this property is DATE-TIME. The time format can be any of the valid forms defined for a DATE-TIME value type. See DATE-TIME value type definition for specific interpretations of the various forms. The value type can be set to DATE.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：此属性的默认值类型为日期时间。时间格式可以是为日期时间值类型定义的任何有效形式。有关各种形式的具体解释，请参见日期时间值类型定义。值类型可以设置为日期。

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property, value data type, time zone identifier and recurrence identifier range parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性、值数据类型、时区标识符和重复标识符范围参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property can be specified in an iCalendar object containing a recurring calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：可以在包含定期日历组件的iCalendar对象中指定此属性。

contents.text: Description: The full range of calendar components specified by a recurrence set is referenced by referring to just the "UID" property value corresponding to the calendar component. The "RECURRENCE-ID" property allows the reference to an individual instance within the recurrence set.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：通过仅引用与日历组件对应的“UID”属性值来引用定期集指定的全部日历组件。“RECURRENCE-ID”属性允许引用重复集中的单个实例。

contents.text: If the value of the "DTSTART" property is a DATE type value, then the value MUST be the calendar date for the recurrence instance.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果“DTSTART”属性的值是日期类型的值，则该值必须是定期实例的日历日期。

contents.text: The date/time value is set to the time when the original recurrence instance would occur; meaning that if the intent is to change a Friday meeting to Thursday, the date/time is still set to the original Friday meeting.
contents.zh-CHS: 日期/时间值设置为原始重复实例发生的时间；这意味着，如果打算将周五会议更改为周四，则日期/时间仍设置为原始的周五会议。

contents.text: The "RECURRENCE-ID" property is used in conjunction with the "UID" and "SEQUENCE" property to identify a particular instance of a recurring event, to-do or journal. For a given pair of "UID" and "SEQUENCE" property values, the "RECURRENCE-ID" value for a recurrence instance is fixed. When the definition of the recurrence set for a calendar component changes, and hence the "SEQUENCE" property value changes, the "RECURRENCE-ID" for a given recurrence instance might also change.The "RANGE" parameter is used to specify the effective range of recurrence instances from the instance specified by the "RECURRENCE-ID" property value. The default value for the range parameter is the single recurrence instance only. The value can also be "THISANDPRIOR" to indicate a range defined by the given recurrence instance and all prior instances or the value can be "THISANDFUTURE" to indicate a range defined by the given recurrence instance and all subsequent instances.
contents.zh-CHS: “RECURRENCE-ID”属性与“UID”和“SEQUENCE”属性结合使用，以标识定期事件、待办事项或日记的特定实例。对于给定的一对“UID”和“SEQUENCE”属性值，递归实例的“RECURRENCE-ID”值是固定的。当日历组件的定期集的定义发生更改，因此“SEQUENCE”属性值发生更改时，给定定期实例的“recurrence-ID”也可能发生更改。“RANGE”参数用于指定从“recurrence-ID”属性值指定的实例开始的定期实例的有效范围。范围参数的默认值仅为单个重复实例。该值也可以是“ThisandPrevior”以表示给定重复实例和所有先前实例定义的范围，或者该值可以是“THISANDFUTURE”以表示给定重复实例和所有后续实例定义的范围。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: recurid = "RECURRENCE-ID" ridparam ":" ridval CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: recurid=“RECURRENCE-ID”ridparam:“ridval CRLF”

contents.text: ridparam   = *(
; the following are optional, ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；但不得超过一次

contents.text:
(";" "VALUE" "=" ("DATE-TIME" / "DATE)) /
(";" tzidparam) / (";" rangeparam) /
; the following is optional, ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparam)
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”xparam）

contents.text: ridval = date-time / date ;Value MUST match value type
contents.zh-CHS: ridval=日期时间/日期；值必须与值类型匹配

contents.text: Example: The following are examples of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: RECURRENCE-ID;VALUE=DATE:19960401
RECURRENCE-ID;RANGE=THISANDFUTURE:19960120T120000Z
4.8.4.5 Related To
Property Name: RELATED-TO
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：关联到

contents.text: Purpose: The property is used to represent a relationship or reference between one calendar component and another.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：该属性用于表示一个日历组件和另一个日历组件之间的关系或引用。

contents.text: Value Type: TEXT
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：文本

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard and relationship type property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准和关系类型属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: The property can be specified one or more times in the "VEVENT", "VTODO" or "VJOURNAL" calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：该属性可以在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”或“VJOURAL”日历组件中指定一次或多次。

contents.text: Description: The property value consists of the persistent, globally unique identifier of another calendar component. This value would be represented in a calendar component by the "UID" property.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：属性值由另一个日历组件的持久、全局唯一标识符组成。该值将在日历组件中由“UID”属性表示。

contents.text: By default, the property value points to another calendar component that has a PARENT relationship to the referencing object. The "RELTYPE" property parameter is used to either explicitly state the default PARENT relationship type to the referenced calendar component or to override the default PARENT relationship type and specify either a CHILD or SIBLING relationship. The PARENT relationship indicates that the calendar component is a subordinate of the referenced calendar component. The CHILD relationship indicates that the calendar component is a superior of the referenced calendar component. The SIBLING relationship indicates that the calendar component is a peer of the referenced calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 默认情况下，属性值指向与引用对象具有父关系的另一个日历组件。“RELTYPE”属性参数用于显式地向引用的日历组件声明默认的父关系类型，或替代默认的父关系类型并指定子关系或同级关系。父关系表示日历组件是引用的日历组件的下级。子关系表示日历组件是引用的日历组件的上级。同级关系表示日历组件是引用的日历组件的对等方。

contents.text: Changes to a calendar component referenced by this property can have an implicit impact on the related calendar component. For example, if a group event changes its start or end date or time, then the related, dependent events will need to have their start and end dates changed in a corresponding way. Similarly, if a PARENT calendar component is canceled or deleted, then there is an implied impact to the related CHILD calendar components. This property is intended only to provide information on the relationship of calendar components. It is up to the target calendar system to maintain any property implications of this relationship.
contents.zh-CHS: 对此属性引用的日历组件所做的更改可能会对相关日历组件产生隐式影响。例如，如果组事件更改其开始或结束日期或时间，则相关的从属事件将需要以相应的方式更改其开始和结束日期。类似地，如果父日历组件被取消或删除，则会对相关子日历组件产生隐含影响。此属性仅用于提供有关日历组件关系的信息。由目标日历系统维护此关系的任何财产含义。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: related = "RELATED-TO" [relparam] ":" text CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: related=“related-TO”[relparam]：“text-CRLF

contents.text: relparam   = *(
; the following is optional, ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；但不得超过一次

contents.text: (";" reltypeparam) /
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”reltypeparam）/

contents.text: ; the following is optional, ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparm)
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”xparm）

contents.text: The following is an example of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: RELATED-TO:<jsmith.part7.19960817T083000.xyzMail@host3.com>
4.8.4.6 Uniform Resource Locator
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.4.6 统一资源定位器

contents.text: Property Name: URL
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：URL

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) associated with the iCalendar object.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义与iCalendar对象关联的统一资源定位器（URL）。

contents.text: Value Type: URI
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：URI

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property can be specified once in the "VEVENT", "VTODO", "VJOURNAL" or "VFREEBUSY" calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：此属性可以在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”、“VJOURNAL”或“VFREEBUSY”日历组件中指定一次。

contents.text: Description: This property may be used in a calendar component to convey a location where a more dynamic rendition of the calendar information associated with the calendar component can be found. This memo does not attempt to standardize the form of the URI, nor the format of the resource pointed to by the property value. If the URL property and Content-Location MIME header are both specified, they MUST point to the same resource.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：此属性可在日历组件中用于传递一个位置，在该位置可以找到与日历组件关联的日历信息的更动态的格式副本。此备忘录不尝试标准化URI的形式，也不尝试标准化属性值所指向的资源的格式。如果URL属性和内容位置MIME头都已指定，则它们必须指向同一资源。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: url = "URL" urlparam ":" uri CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: url=“url”urlparam:“uri CRLF”

contents.text: urlparam   = *(";" xparam)
Example: The following is an example of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: URL:http://abc.com/pub/calendars/jsmith/mytime.ics
4.8.4.7 Unique Identifier
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.4.7 唯一标识符

contents.text: Property Name: UID
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：UID

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines the persistent, globally unique identifier for the calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义日历组件的持久、全局唯一标识符。

contents.text: Value Type: TEXT
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：文本

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: The property MUST be specified in the "VEVENT", "VTODO", "VJOURNAL" or "VFREEBUSY" calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：必须在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”、“VJOURNAL”或“VFREEBUSY”日历组件中指定该属性。

contents.text: Description: The UID itself MUST be a globally unique identifier. The generator of the identifier MUST guarantee that the identifier is unique. There are several algorithms that can be used to accomplish this. The identifier is RECOMMENDED to be the identical syntax to the [RFC 822] addr-spec. A good method to assure uniqueness is to put the domain name or a domain literal IP address of the host on which the identifier was created on the right hand side of the "@", and on the left hand side, put a combination of the current calendar date and time of day (i.e., formatted in as a DATE-TIME value) along with some other currently unique (perhaps sequential) identifier available on the system (for example, a process id number). Using a date/time value on the left hand side and a domain name or domain literal on
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：UID本身必须是全局唯一标识符。标识符的生成器必须保证标识符是唯一的。有几种算法可以用来实现这一点。建议标识符采用与[RFC 822]addr-spec相同的语法。确保唯一性的一个好方法是将创建标识符的主机的域名或域文字IP地址放在“@”的右侧和左侧，将当前日历日期和时间（即，格式化为日期时间值）与系统上可用的其他当前唯一（可能是顺序）标识符（例如，进程id号）组合在一起。在左侧使用日期/时间值，在左侧使用域名或域文字

contents.text: the right hand side makes it possible to guarantee uniqueness since no two hosts should be using the same domain name or IP address at the same time. Though other algorithms will work, it is RECOMMENDED that the right hand side contain some domain identifier (either of the host itself or otherwise) such that the generator of the message identifier can guarantee the uniqueness of the left hand side within the scope of that domain.
contents.zh-CHS: 右侧可以保证唯一性，因为没有两台主机应该同时使用相同的域名或IP地址。尽管其他算法也可以工作，但建议右侧包含一些域标识符（主机本身或其他），以便消息标识符的生成器可以保证左侧在该域范围内的唯一性。

contents.text: This is the method for correlating scheduling messages with the referenced "VEVENT", "VTODO", or "VJOURNAL" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是将调度消息与引用的“VEVENT”、“VTODO”或“VJOURAL”日历组件关联的方法。

contents.text: The full range of calendar components specified by a recurrence set is referenced by referring to just the "UID" property value corresponding to the calendar component. The "RECURRENCE-ID" property allows the reference to an individual instance within the recurrence set.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过仅引用与日历组件对应的“UID”属性值，可以引用由重复集指定的全部日历组件。“RECURRENCE-ID”属性允许引用重复集中的单个实例。

contents.text: This property is an important method for group scheduling applications to match requests with later replies, modifications or deletion requests. Calendaring and scheduling applications MUST generate this property in "VEVENT", "VTODO" and "VJOURNAL" calendar components to assure interoperability with other group scheduling applications. This identifier is created by the calendar system that generates an iCalendar object.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性是组调度应用程序将请求与稍后的答复、修改或删除请求相匹配的重要方法。日历和调度应用程序必须在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”和“VJORY”日历组件中生成此属性，以确保与其他组调度应用程序的互操作性。此标识符由生成iCalendar对象的日历系统创建。

contents.text: Implementations MUST be able to receive and persist values of at least 255 characters for this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 实现必须能够接收并保持此属性至少255个字符的值。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: uid = "UID" uidparam ":" text CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: uid=“uid”uidparam:“文本CRLF”

contents.text: uidparam   = *(";" xparam)
Example: The following is an example of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: 4.8.5 Recurrence Component Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.5 递归组件属性

contents.text: The following properties specify recurrence information in calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下属性指定日历组件中的定期信息。

contents.text: 4.8.5.1 Exception Date/Times
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.5.1 例外日期/次数

contents.text: Property Name: EXDATE
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：EXDATE

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines the list of date/time exceptions for a recurring calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义定期日历组件的日期/时间异常列表。

contents.text: Value Type: The default value type for this property is DATE-TIME. The value type can be set to DATE.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：此属性的默认值类型为日期时间。值类型可以设置为日期。

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard, value data type and time zone identifier property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准、值数据类型和时区标识符属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property can be specified in an iCalendar object that includes a recurring calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：可以在包含定期日历组件的iCalendar对象中指定此属性。

contents.text: Description: The exception dates, if specified, are used in computing the recurrence set. The recurrence set is the complete set of recurrence instances for a calendar component. The recurrence set is generated by considering the initial "DTSTART" property along with the "RRULE", "RDATE", "EXDATE" and "EXRULE" properties contained within the iCalendar object. The "DTSTART" property defines the first instance in the recurrence set. Multiple instances of the "RRULE" and "EXRULE" properties can also be specified to define more sophisticated recurrence sets. The final recurrence set is generated by gathering all of the start date-times generated by any of the specified "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties, and then excluding any start date and times which fall within the union of start date and times generated by any specified "EXRULE" and "EXDATE" properties. This implies that start date and times within exclusion related properties (i.e., "EXDATE" and "EXRULE") take precedence over those specified by inclusion properties (i.e., "RDATE" and "RRULE"). Where duplicate instances are generated by the "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties, only one recurrence is considered. Duplicate instances are ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：异常日期（如果指定）用于计算重复集。重复集是日历组件的完整重复实例集。通过考虑初始“DTSTART”属性以及iCalendar对象中包含的“RRULE”、“RDATE”、“EXDATE”和“EXRULE”属性，可以生成重复集。“DTSTART”属性定义重复集合中的第一个实例。还可以指定“RRULE”和“EXRULE”属性的多个实例来定义更复杂的重复集。通过收集由任何指定的“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性生成的所有开始日期时间，然后排除由任何指定的“EXRULE”和“EXDATE”属性生成的开始日期和时间的联合范围内的任何开始日期和时间，生成最终的重复集。这意味着排除相关属性（即“EXDATE”和“EXRULE”）中的开始日期和时间优先于包含属性（即“RDATE”和“RRULE”）指定的开始日期和时间。如果“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性生成重复实例，则只考虑一次重复。重复的实例将被忽略。

contents.text: The "EXDATE" property can be used to exclude the value specified in "DTSTART". However, in such cases the original "DTSTART" date MUST still be maintained by the calendaring and scheduling system because the original "DTSTART" value has inherent usage dependencies by other properties such as the "RECURRENCE-ID".
contents.zh-CHS: “EXDATE”属性可用于排除“DTSTART”中指定的值。但是，在这种情况下，日历和日程安排系统仍必须维护原始“DTSTART”日期，因为原始“DTSTART”值与其他属性（如“RECURRENCE-ID”）具有内在的使用依赖性。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: exdate     = "EXDATE" exdtparam ":" exdtval *("," exdtval) CRLF
exdtparam  = *(
; the following are optional, ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；但不得超过一次

contents.text: (";" "VALUE" "=" ("DATE-TIME" / "DATE")) /
(";" tzidparam) /
contents.zh-CHS: （；“Tziparam）/

contents.text: ; the following is optional, ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparam)
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”xparam）

contents.text: exdtval = date-time / date ;Value MUST match value type
contents.zh-CHS: exdtval=日期时间/日期；值必须与值类型匹配

contents.text: Example: The following is an example of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: 4.8.5.2 Exception Rule
Property Name: EXRULE
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：EXRULE

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines a rule or repeating pattern for an exception to a recurrence set.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：此属性为重复集的异常定义规则或重复模式。

contents.text: Value Type: RECUR
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：重现

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property can be specified in "VEVENT", "VTODO" or "VJOURNAL" calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：可以在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”或“VJOURNAL”日历组件中指定此属性。

contents.text: Description: The exception rule, if specified, is used in computing the recurrence set. The recurrence set is the complete set of recurrence instances for a calendar component. The recurrence set is generated by considering the initial "DTSTART" property along with the "RRULE", "RDATE", "EXDATE" and "EXRULE" properties contained within the iCalendar object. The "DTSTART" defines the first instance in the recurrence set. Multiple instances of the "RRULE" and "EXRULE" properties can also be specified to define more sophisticated recurrence sets. The final recurrence set is generated by gathering all of the start date-times generated by any of the specified "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties, and excluding any start date and times which fall within the union of start date and times generated by any specified "EXRULE" and "EXDATE" properties. This implies that start date and times within exclusion related properties (i.e., "EXDATE" and "EXRULE") take precedence over those specified by inclusion
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：异常规则（如果指定）用于计算重复集。重复集是日历组件的完整重复实例集。通过考虑初始“DTSTART”属性以及iCalendar对象中包含的“RRULE”、“RDATE”、“EXDATE”和“EXRULE”属性，可以生成重复集。“DTSTART”定义了重复集合中的第一个实例。还可以指定“RRULE”和“EXRULE”属性的多个实例来定义更复杂的重复集。通过收集由任何指定的“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性生成的所有开始日期时间，并排除由任何指定的“EXRULE”和“EXDATE”属性生成的开始日期和时间并集内的任何开始日期和时间，生成最终的重复集。这意味着排除相关属性（即“EXDATE”和“EXRULE”）中的开始日期和时间优先于包含指定的日期和时间

contents.text: properties (i.e., "RDATE" and "RRULE"). Where duplicate instances are generated by the "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties, only one recurrence is considered. Duplicate instances are ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性（即“RDATE”和“RRULE”）。如果“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性生成重复实例，则只考虑一次重复。重复的实例将被忽略。

contents.text: The "EXRULE" property can be used to exclude the value specified in "DTSTART". However, in such cases the original "DTSTART" date MUST still be maintained by the calendaring and scheduling system because the original "DTSTART" value has inherent usage dependencies by other properties such as the "RECURRENCE-ID".
contents.zh-CHS: “EXRULE”属性可用于排除“DTSTART”中指定的值。但是，在这种情况下，日历和日程安排系统仍必须维护原始“DTSTART”日期，因为原始“DTSTART”值与其他属性（如“RECURRENCE-ID”）具有内在的使用依赖性。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: exrule = "EXRULE" exrparam ":" recur CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: exrule=“exrule”exrparam”：“重复CRLF

contents.text: exrparam   = *(";" xparam)
Example: The following are examples of this property. Except every other week, on Tuesday and Thursday for 4 occurrences:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例。除每隔一周外，周二和周四发生4次：

contents.text: EXRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;COUNT=4;INTERVAL=2;BYDAY=TU,TH
Except daily for 10 occurrences:
contents.zh-CHS: 除每天发生10次外：

contents.text: EXRULE:FREQ=DAILY;COUNT=10
Except yearly in June and July for 8 occurrences:
contents.zh-CHS: 除每年6月和7月发生的8起事件外：

contents.text: EXRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;COUNT=8;BYMONTH=6,7
4.8.5.3 Recurrence Date/Times
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.5.3 重现日期/次数

contents.text: Property Name: RDATE
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：RDATE

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines the list of date/times for a recurrence set.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义重复集的日期/时间列表。

contents.text: Value Type: The default value type for this property is DATE-TIME. The value type can be set to DATE or PERIOD.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：此属性的默认值类型为日期时间。值类型可以设置为日期或期间。

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard, value data type and time zone identifier property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准、值数据类型和时区标识符属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: The property can be specified in "VEVENT", "VTODO", "VJOURNAL" or "VTIMEZONE" calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：可以在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”、“VJOURNAL”或“VTIMEZONE”日历组件中指定该属性。

contents.text: Description: This property can appear along with the "RRULE" property to define an aggregate set of repeating occurrences. When they both appear in an iCalendar object, the recurring events are defined by the union of occurrences defined by both the "RDATE" and "RRULE".
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：此属性可以与“RRULE”属性一起出现，以定义重复出现的聚合集。当它们都出现在iCalendar对象中时，重复事件由“RDATE”和“RRULE”定义的事件的并集定义。

contents.text: The recurrence dates, if specified, are used in computing the recurrence set. The recurrence set is the complete set of recurrence instances for a calendar component. The recurrence set is generated by considering the initial "DTSTART" property along with the "RRULE", "RDATE", "EXDATE" and "EXRULE" properties contained within the iCalendar object. The "DTSTART" property defines the first instance in the recurrence set. Multiple instances of the "RRULE" and "EXRULE" properties can also be specified to define more sophisticated recurrence sets. The final recurrence set is generated by gathering all of the start date/times generated by any of the specified "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties, and excluding any start date/times which fall within the union of start date/times generated by any specified "EXRULE" and "EXDATE" properties. This implies that start date/times within exclusion related properties (i.e., "EXDATE" and "EXRULE") take precedence over those specified by inclusion properties (i.e., "RDATE" and "RRULE"). Where duplicate instances are generated by the "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties, only one recurrence is considered. Duplicate instances are ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 重复日期（如果指定）用于计算重复集。重复集是日历组件的完整重复实例集。通过考虑初始“DTSTART”属性以及iCalendar对象中包含的“RRULE”、“RDATE”、“EXDATE”和“EXRULE”属性，可以生成重复集。“DTSTART”属性定义重复集合中的第一个实例。还可以指定“RRULE”和“EXRULE”属性的多个实例来定义更复杂的重复集。通过收集由任何指定的“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性生成的所有开始日期/时间，并排除由任何指定的“EXRULE”和“EXDATE”属性生成的开始日期/时间的联合范围内的任何开始日期/时间，生成最终的定期集。这意味着排除相关属性（即“EXDATE”和“EXRULE”）中的开始日期/时间优先于包含属性（即“RDATE”和“RRULE”）指定的开始日期/时间。如果“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性生成重复实例，则只考虑一次重复。重复的实例将被忽略。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: rdate      = "RDATE" rdtparam ":" rdtval *("," rdtval) CRLF
rdtparam   = *(
; the following are optional, ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；但不得超过一次

contents.text:
(";" "VALUE" "=" ("DATE-TIME" / "DATE" / "PERIOD")) /
(";" tzidparam) /
; the following is optional, ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparam)
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”xparam）

contents.text:
rdtval     = date-time / date / period
;Value MUST match value type
Example: The following are examples of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: RDATE;TZID=US-EASTERN:19970714T083000
4.8.5.4 Recurrence Rule
Property Name: RRULE
contents.zh-CHS: 物业名称：RRULE

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines a rule or repeating pattern for recurring events, to-dos, or time zone definitions.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义定期事件、待办事项或时区定义的规则或重复模式。

contents.text: Value Type: RECUR
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：重现

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property can be specified one or more times in recurring "VEVENT", "VTODO" and "VJOURNAL" calendar components. It can also be specified once in each STANDARD or DAYLIGHT sub-component of the "VTIMEZONE" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：此属性可以在重复出现的“VEVENT”、“VTODO”和“VJOURAL”日历组件中指定一次或多次。也可以在“VTIMEZONE”日历组件的每个标准或日光子组件中指定一次。

contents.text: Description: The recurrence rule, if specified, is used in computing the recurrence set. The recurrence set is the complete set of recurrence instances for a calendar component. The recurrence set is generated by considering the initial "DTSTART" property along with the "RRULE", "RDATE", "EXDATE" and "EXRULE" properties contained within the iCalendar object. The "DTSTART" property defines the first instance in the recurrence set. Multiple instances of the "RRULE" and "EXRULE" properties can also be specified to define more sophisticated recurrence sets. The final recurrence set is generated by gathering all of the start date/times generated by any of the specified "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties, and excluding any start date/times which fall within the union of start date/times generated by any specified "EXRULE" and "EXDATE" properties. This implies that start date/times within exclusion related properties (i.e., "EXDATE" and "EXRULE") take precedence over those specified by inclusion properties (i.e., "RDATE" and "RRULE"). Where duplicate instances are generated by the "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties, only one recurrence is considered. Duplicate instances are ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：递归规则（如果指定）用于计算递归集。重复集是日历组件的完整重复实例集。通过考虑初始“DTSTART”属性以及iCalendar对象中包含的“RRULE”、“RDATE”、“EXDATE”和“EXRULE”属性，可以生成重复集。“DTSTART”属性定义重复集合中的第一个实例。还可以指定“RRULE”和“EXRULE”属性的多个实例来定义更复杂的重复集。通过收集由任何指定的“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性生成的所有开始日期/时间，并排除由任何指定的“EXRULE”和“EXDATE”属性生成的开始日期/时间的联合范围内的任何开始日期/时间，生成最终的定期集。这意味着排除相关属性（即“EXDATE”和“EXRULE”）中的开始日期/时间优先于包含属性（即“RDATE”和“RRULE”）指定的开始日期/时间。如果“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性生成重复实例，则只考虑一次重复。重复的实例将被忽略。

contents.text: The "DTSTART" and "DTEND" property pair or "DTSTART" and "DURATION" property pair, specified within the iCalendar object defines the first instance of the recurrence. When used with a recurrence rule, the "DTSTART" and "DTEND" properties MUST be specified in local time and the appropriate set of "VTIMEZONE" calendar components MUST be included. For detail on the usage of the "VTIMEZONE" calendar component, see the "VTIMEZONE" calendar component definition.
contents.zh-CHS: 在iCalendar对象中指定的“DTSTART”和“DTEND”属性对或“DTSTART”和“DURATION”属性对定义了循环的第一个实例。当与定期规则一起使用时，必须在本地时间指定“DTSTART”和“DTEND”属性，并且必须包括一组适当的“VTIMEZONE”日历组件。有关“VTIMEZONE”日历组件用法的详细信息，请参阅“VTIMEZONE”日历组件定义。

contents.text: Any duration associated with the iCalendar object applies to all members of the generated recurrence set. Any modified duration for specific recurrences MUST be explicitly specified using the "RDATE" property.
contents.zh-CHS: 与iCalendar对象关联的任何持续时间都适用于生成的重复集的所有成员。必须使用“RDATE”属性明确指定特定复发的任何修改持续时间。

contents.text: Format Definition: This property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：此属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: rrule = "RRULE" rrulparam ":" recur CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: rrule=“rrule”rrulparam:“重现CRLF”

contents.text: rrulparam  = *(";" xparam)
Example: All examples assume the Eastern United States time zone.
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：所有示例均假定美国东部时区。

contents.text: Daily for 10 occurrences:
contents.zh-CHS: 每天发生10次：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970902T090000
RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;COUNT=10

contents.zh-CHS: ==>（1997年美国东部时间上午9:00）9月13日；10月11日（1997年美国东部时间上午9:00）11月8日；12月13日（1998年美国东部时间上午9:00）1月10日；二月七日,；3月7日（1998年美国东部夏令时上午9:00）4月11日；5月9日；六月十三日。。。

contents.text: Every four years, the first Tuesday after a Monday in November, forever (U.S. Presidential Election day):
contents.zh-CHS: 每四年，即11月的星期一之后的第一个星期二，永远（美国总统选举日）：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19961105T090000
RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;INTERVAL=4;BYMONTH=11;BYDAY=TU;BYMONTHDAY=2,3,4,
 5,6,7,8
==> (1996 9:00 AM EST)November 5 (2000 9:00 AM EST)November 7 (2004 9:00 AM EST)November 2 ...
contents.zh-CHS: ==>（1996年美国东部时间上午9:00）11月5日（2000年美国东部时间上午9:00）11月7日（2004年美国东部时间上午9:00）11月2日。。。

contents.text: The 3rd instance into the month of one of Tuesday, Wednesday or Thursday, for the next 3 months:
contents.zh-CHS: 第三次进入周二、周三或周四其中一个月，持续3个月：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970904T090000
RRULE:FREQ=MONTHLY;COUNT=3;BYDAY=TU,WE,TH;BYSETPOS=3

==> (1997 9:00 AM EDT)September 4;October 7
    (1997 9:00 AM EST)November 6
The 2nd to last weekday of the month:
contents.zh-CHS: 每月的第2至最后一个工作日：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970929T090000
RRULE:FREQ=MONTHLY;BYDAY=MO,TU,WE,TH,FR;BYSETPOS=-2
==> (1997 9:00 AM EDT)September 29 (1997 9:00 AM EST)October 30;November 27;December 30 (1998 9:00 AM EST)January 29;February 26;March 30 ...
contents.zh-CHS: ==>（1997年美国东部时间上午9:00）9月29日（1997年美国东部时间上午9:00）10月30日；11月27日；12月30日（1998年美国东部时间上午9:00）1月29日；二月二十六日,；3月30日。。。

contents.text: Every 3 hours from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM on a specific day:
contents.zh-CHS: 在特定日期，每3小时从上午9:00到下午5:00：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970902T090000
RRULE:FREQ=HOURLY;INTERVAL=3;UNTIL=19970902T170000Z
Every 15 minutes for 6 occurrences:
contents.zh-CHS: 每15分钟发生6次：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970902T090000
RRULE:FREQ=MINUTELY;INTERVAL=15;COUNT=6
Every hour and a half for 4 occurrences:
contents.zh-CHS: 每一个半小时发生4次：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970902T090000
RRULE:FREQ=MINUTELY;INTERVAL=90;COUNT=4
Every 20 minutes from 9:00 AM to 4:40 PM every day:
contents.zh-CHS: 每天上午9:00至下午4:40，每20分钟：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970902T090000
RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;BYHOUR=9,10,11,12,13,14,15,16;BYMINUTE=0,20,40
or
RRULE:FREQ=MINUTELY;INTERVAL=20;BYHOUR=9,10,11,12,13,14,15,16
An example where the days generated makes a difference because of WKST:
contents.zh-CHS: 因WKST产生的天数产生差异的示例：

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970805T090000
RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=2;COUNT=4;BYDAY=TU,SU;WKST=MO
changing only WKST from MO to SU, yields different results...
contents.zh-CHS: 仅将WKST从MO更改为SU，会产生不同的结果。。。

contents.text:
DTSTART;TZID=US-Eastern:19970805T090000
RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=2;COUNT=4;BYDAY=TU,SU;WKST=SU
==> (1997 EDT)August 5,17,19,31
4.8.6 Alarm Component Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.6 报警组件属性

contents.text: The following properties specify alarm information in calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下属性指定日历组件中的报警信息。

contents.text: 4.8.6.1 Action
Property Name: ACTION
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：操作

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines the action to be invoked when an alarm is triggered.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义触发报警时要调用的操作。

contents.text: Value Type: TEXT
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：文本

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property MUST be specified once in a "VALARM" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：此属性必须在“VALARM”日历组件中指定一次。

contents.text: Description: Each "VALARM" calendar component has a particular type of action associated with it. This property specifies the type of action
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：每个“VALARM”日历组件都有与之关联的特定类型的操作。此属性指定操作的类型

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: action = "ACTION" actionparam ":" actionvalue CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: action=“action”actionparam:“actionvalue CRLF”

contents.text: actionparam        = *(";" xparam)

actionvalue        = "AUDIO" / "DISPLAY" / "EMAIL" / "PROCEDURE"
                   / iana-token / x-name
Example: The following are examples of this property in a "VALARM" calendar component:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是“VALARM”日历组件中此属性的示例：

contents.text: ACTION:AUDIO
contents.zh-CHS: 行动：音频

contents.text: ACTION:DISPLAY
contents.zh-CHS: 行动：显示

contents.text: ACTION:PROCEDURE
contents.zh-CHS: 行动：程序

contents.text: 4.8.6.2 Repeat Count
Property Name: REPEAT
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：重复

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines the number of time the alarm should be repeated, after the initial trigger.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义初始触发后应重复报警的时间。

contents.text: Value Type: INTEGER
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：整数

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property can be specified in a "VALARM" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：可以在“VALARM”日历组件中指定此属性。

contents.text: Description: If the alarm triggers more than once, then this property MUST be specified along with the "DURATION" property.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：如果报警触发多次，则必须将此属性与“持续时间”属性一起指定。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: repeatcnt = "REPEAT" repparam ":" integer CRLF ;Default is "0", zero.
contents.zh-CHS: repeatcnt=“REPEAT”repparam:“整数CRLF；默认值为“0”，零。

contents.text: repparam   = *(";" xparam)
Example: The following is an example of this property for an alarm that repeats 4 additional times with a 5 minute delay after the initial triggering of the alarm:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是警报初始触发后以5分钟延迟重复4次额外警报的此属性示例：

contents.text: REPEAT:4 DURATION:PT5M
contents.zh-CHS: 重复：4次持续时间：PT5M

contents.text: 4.8.6.3 Trigger
Property Name: TRIGGER
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：触发器

contents.text: Purpose: This property specifies when an alarm will trigger.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性指定何时触发报警。

contents.text: Value Type: The default value type is DURATION. The value type can be set to a DATE-TIME value type, in which case the value MUST specify a UTC formatted DATE-TIME value.
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：默认值类型为持续时间。值类型可以设置为日期时间值类型，在这种情况下，值必须指定UTC格式的日期时间值。

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard, value data type, time zone identifier or trigger relationship property parameters can be specified on this property. The trigger relationship property parameter MUST only be specified when the value type is DURATION.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准、值数据类型、时区标识符或触发器关系属性参数。仅当值类型为DURATION时，才能指定触发器关系属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property MUST be specified in the "VALARM" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：必须在“VALARM”日历组件中指定此属性。

contents.text: Description: Within the "VALARM" calendar component, this property defines when the alarm will trigger. The default value type is DURATION, specifying a relative time for the trigger of the alarm. The default duration is relative to the start of an event or to-do that the alarm is associated with. The duration can be explicitly set
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：在“VALARM”日历组件中，此属性定义何时触发报警。默认值类型为持续时间，指定报警触发的相对时间。默认持续时间与报警关联的事件或待办事项的开始时间相关。可以显式设置持续时间

contents.text: to trigger from either the end or the start of the associated event or to-do with the "RELATED" parameter. A value of START will set the alarm to trigger off the start of the associated event or to-do. A value of END will set the alarm to trigger off the end of the associated event or to-do.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用“RELATED”参数从关联事件或待办事项的结束或开始触发。START值将设置警报，以触发相关事件或待办事项的启动。END值将设置报警，以触发相关事件或待办事项的结束。

contents.text: Either a positive or negative duration may be specified for the "TRIGGER" property. An alarm with a positive duration is triggered after the associated start or end of the event or to-do. An alarm with a negative duration is triggered before the associated start or end of the event or to-do.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以为“触发器”属性指定正持续时间或负持续时间。事件或待办事项的相关开始或结束后，将触发持续时间为正的报警。在相关事件或待办事项的开始或结束之前触发持续时间为负的报警。

contents.text: The "RELATED" property parameter is not valid if the value type of the property is set to DATE-TIME (i.e., for an absolute date and time alarm trigger). If a value type of DATE-TIME is specified, then the property value MUST be specified in the UTC time format. If an absolute trigger is specified on an alarm for a recurring event or to-do, then the alarm will only trigger for the specified absolute date/time, along with any specified repeating instances.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果属性的值类型设置为日期-时间（即，对于绝对日期和时间报警触发器），则“相关”属性参数无效。如果指定了日期时间的值类型，则必须以UTC时间格式指定属性值。如果为周期性事件或待办事项在报警上指定了绝对触发器，则报警将仅在指定的绝对日期/时间以及任何指定的重复实例中触发。

contents.text: If the trigger is set relative to START, then the "DTSTART" property MUST be present in the associated "VEVENT" or "VTODO" calendar component. If an alarm is specified for an event with the trigger set relative to the END, then the "DTEND" property or the "DSTART" and "DURATION' properties MUST be present in the associated "VEVENT" calendar component. If the alarm is specified for a to-do with a trigger set relative to the END, then either the "DUE" property or the "DSTART" and "DURATION' properties MUST be present in the associated "VTODO" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果触发器是相对于START设置的，则“DTSTART”属性必须存在于相关的“VEVENT”或“VTODO”日历组件中。如果为具有相对于结束的触发器集的事件指定了报警，则“DTEND”属性或“DSTART”和“DURATION”属性必须出现在关联的“VEVENT”日历组件中。如果为具有相对于结束的触发器集的待办事项指定了报警，则“DUE”属性或“DSTART”和“持续时间”属性必须存在于关联的“VTODO”日历组件中。

contents.text: Alarms specified in an event or to-do which is defined in terms of a DATE value type will be triggered relative to 00:00:00 UTC on the specified date. For example, if "DTSTART:19980205, then the duration trigger will be relative to19980205T000000Z.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据日期值类型定义的事件或待办事项中指定的报警将在指定日期相对于UTC 00:00:00触发。例如，如果“DTSTART:19980205”，则持续时间触发器将与19980205T000000Z相关。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: trigger = "TRIGGER" (trigrel / trigabs)
contents.zh-CHS: trigger=“trigger”（trigrel/trigabs）

contents.text: trigrel    = *(
; the following are optional, ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；但不得超过一次

contents.text:
(";" "VALUE" "=" "DURATION") /
(";" trigrelparam) /
; the following is optional,
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下选项是可选的，

contents.text: ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparam) ) ":" dur-value
contents.zh-CHS: （“；“xparam”）：“dur值

contents.text: trigabs    = 1*(
; the following is REQUIRED, ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是必需的；但不得超过一次

contents.text: (";" "VALUE" "=" "DATE-TIME") /
; the following is optional, ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparam)
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”xparam）

contents.text: ) ":" date-time
contents.zh-CHS: )“：”日期时间

contents.text: Example: A trigger set 15 minutes prior to the start of the event or to-do.
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：事件或待办事项开始前15分钟设置的触发器。

contents.text: TRIGGER:-P15M
contents.zh-CHS: 触发器：-P15M

contents.text: A trigger set 5 minutes after the end of the event or to-do.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件或待办事项结束5分钟后设置的触发器。

contents.text: TRIGGER;RELATED=END:P5M
A trigger set to an absolute date/time.
contents.zh-CHS: 设置为绝对日期/时间的触发器。

contents.text: TRIGGER;VALUE=DATE-TIME:19980101T050000Z
4.8.7 Change Management Component Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.7 更改管理组件属性

contents.text: The following properties specify change management information in calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下属性指定日历组件中的更改管理信息。

contents.text: 4.8.7.1 Date/Time Created
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.7.1 创建日期/时间

contents.text: Property Name: CREATED
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：已创建

contents.text: Purpose: This property specifies the date and time that the calendar information was created by the calendar user agent in the calendar store.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性指定日历用户代理在日历存储中创建日历信息的日期和时间。

contents.text: Note: This is analogous to the creation date and time for a file in the file system.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：这类似于文件系统中文件的创建日期和时间。

contents.text: Value Type: DATE-TIME
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：日期时间

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: The property can be specified once in "VEVENT", "VTODO" or "VJOURNAL" calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：该属性可以在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”或“VJOURNAL”日历组件中指定一次。

contents.text: Description: The date and time is a UTC value.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：日期和时间是UTC值。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: created = "CREATED" creaparam ":" date-time CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: created=“created”creaparam:“日期时间CRLF”

contents.text: creaparam  = *(";" xparam)
Example: The following is an example of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: 4.8.7.2 Date/Time Stamp
Property Name: DTSTAMP
contents.zh-CHS: 物业名称：DTSTAMP

contents.text: Purpose: The property indicates the date/time that the instance of the iCalendar object was created.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：该属性表示创建iCalendar对象实例的日期/时间。

contents.text: Value Type: DATE-TIME
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：日期时间

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property MUST be included in the "VEVENT", "VTODO", "VJOURNAL" or "VFREEBUSY" calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：此属性必须包含在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”、“VJOURNAL”或“VFREEBUSY”日历组件中。

contents.text: Description: The value MUST be specified in the UTC time format.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：必须以UTC时间格式指定该值。

contents.text: This property is also useful to protocols such as [IMIP] that have inherent latency issues with the delivery of content. This property will assist in the proper sequencing of messages containing iCalendar objects.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性对于[IMIP]等协议也很有用，这些协议在交付内容时存在固有的延迟问题。此属性将有助于对包含iCalendar对象的消息进行正确排序。

contents.text: This property is different than the "CREATED" and "LAST-MODIFIED" properties. These two properties are used to specify when the particular calendar data in the calendar store was created and last modified. This is different than when the iCalendar object representation of the calendar service information was created or last modified.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性不同于“已创建”和“上次修改”属性。这两个属性用于指定日历存储中特定日历数据的创建时间和上次修改时间。这与创建或上次修改日历服务信息的iCalendar对象表示时不同。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: dtstamp = "DTSTAMP" stmparam ":" date-time CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: dtstamp=“dtstamp”stmparam:“日期时间CRLF”

contents.text: stmparam   = *(";" xparam)
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: 4.8.7.3 Last Modified
Property Name: LAST-MODIFIED
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：上次修改

contents.text: Purpose: The property specifies the date and time that the information associated with the calendar component was last revised in the calendar store.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：该属性指定上次在日历存储中修改与日历组件关联的信息的日期和时间。

contents.text: Note: This is analogous to the modification date and time for a file in the file system.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：这类似于文件系统中文件的修改日期和时间。

contents.text: Value Type: DATE-TIME
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：日期时间

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property can be specified in the "EVENT", "VTODO", "VJOURNAL" or "VTIMEZONE" calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：可以在“事件”、“VTODO”、“VJOURNAL”或“VTIMEZONE”日历组件中指定此属性。

contents.text: Description: The property value MUST be specified in the UTC time format.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：必须以UTC时间格式指定属性值。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: last-mod = "LAST-MODIFIED" lstparam ":" date-time CRLF
contents.zh-CHS: last mod=“last-MODIFIED”lstparam:“日期时间CRLF”

contents.text: lstparam   = *(";" xparam)
Example: The following is are examples of this property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的示例：

contents.text: LAST-MODIFIED:19960817T133000Z
4.8.7.4 Sequence Number
Property Name: SEQUENCE
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：序列

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines the revision sequence number of the calendar component within a sequence of revisions.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义修订序列中日历组件的修订序列号。

contents.text: Value Type: integer
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：整数

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: The property can be specified in "VEVENT", "VTODO" or "VJOURNAL" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：可以在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”或“VJOURNAL”日历组件中指定该属性。

contents.text: Description: When a calendar component is created, its sequence number is zero (US-ASCII decimal 48). It is monotonically incremented by the "Organizer's" CUA each time the "Organizer" makes a significant revision to the calendar component. When the "Organizer" makes changes to one of the following properties, the sequence number MUST be incremented:
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：创建日历组件时，其序列号为零（US-ASCII十进制48）。每次“组织者”对日历组件进行重大修改时，“组织者”的CUA都会单调递增。当“组织者”更改下列属性之一时，序列号必须递增：

contents.text: . "DTSTART"
contents.zh-CHS: . “DTSTART”

contents.text: . "DTEND"
contents.zh-CHS: . “数据终端”

contents.text: . "DUE"
contents.zh-CHS: . “到期”

contents.text: . "RDATE"
contents.zh-CHS: . “RDATE”

contents.text: . "RRULE"
contents.zh-CHS: . “腐败”

contents.text: . "EXDATE"
contents.zh-CHS: . “出厂日期”

contents.text: . "EXRULE"
contents.zh-CHS: . “EXRULE”

contents.text: . "STATUS"
contents.zh-CHS: . “地位”

contents.text: In addition, changes made by the "Organizer" to other properties can also force the sequence number to be incremented. The "Organizer" CUA MUST increment the sequence number when ever it makes changes to properties in the calendar component that the "Organizer" deems will jeopardize the validity of the participation status of the "Attendees". For example, changing the location of a meeting from one locale to another distant locale could effectively impact the participation status of the "Attendees".
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，“组织者”对其他属性所做的更改也可以强制增加序列号。“组织者”CUA在对日历组件中的属性进行更改时，必须增加序号，而“组织者”认为这些更改将危及“与会者”参与状态的有效性。例如，将会议地点从一个区域更改为另一个远程区域可以有效地影响“与会者”的参与状态。

contents.text: The "Organizer" includes this property in an iCalendar object that it sends to an "Attendee" to specify the current version of the calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: “组织者”将此属性包含在iCalendar对象中，该对象发送给“与会者”以指定日历组件的当前版本。

contents.text: The "Attendee" includes this property in an iCalendar object that it sends to the "Organizer" to specify the version of the calendar component that the "Attendee" is referring to.
contents.zh-CHS: “与会者”将此属性包含在iCalendar对象中，该对象发送给“组织者”，以指定“与会者”所引用的日历组件的版本。

contents.text: A change to the sequence number is not the mechanism that an "Organizer" uses to request a response from the "Attendees". The "RSVP" parameter on the "ATTENDEE" property is used by the "Organizer" to indicate that a response from the "Attendees" is requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 更改序列号不是“组织者”请求“与会者”响应的机制。“组织者”使用“与会者”属性上的“RSVP”参数表示请求“与会者”的响应。

contents.text: Format Definition: This property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：此属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text: seq = "SEQUENCE" seqparam ":" integer CRLF ; Default is "0"
contents.zh-CHS: seq=“SEQUENCE”seqparam:“整数CRLF；默认值为“0”

contents.text: seqparam   = *(";" xparam)
Example: The following is an example of this property for a calendar component that was just created by the "Organizer".
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是“组织者”刚刚创建的日历组件的此属性示例。

contents.text: SEQUENCE:0
contents.zh-CHS: 序列：0

contents.text: The following is an example of this property for a calendar component that has been revised two different times by the "Organizer".
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是“组织者”已修改两次的日历组件的此属性示例。

contents.text: SEQUENCE:2
contents.zh-CHS: 顺序：2

contents.text: 4.8.8 Miscellaneous Component Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.8 杂项组件属性

contents.text: The following properties specify information about a number of miscellaneous features of calendar components.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下属性指定有关日历组件的许多其他功能的信息。

contents.text: 4.8.8.1 Non-standard Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8.8.1 非标准属性

contents.text: Property Name: Any property name with a "X-" prefix
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：任何带有“X-”前缀的属性名称

contents.text: Purpose: This class of property provides a framework for defining non-standard properties.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此类属性提供了定义非标准属性的框架。

contents.text: Value Type: TEXT
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：文本

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard and language property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准和语言属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: This property can be specified in any calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：此属性可以在任何日历组件中指定。

contents.text: Description: The MIME Calendaring and Scheduling Content Type provides a "standard mechanism for doing non-standard things". This extension support is provided for implementers to "push the envelope" on the existing version of the memo. Extension properties are
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：MIME日历和日程安排内容类型提供了“执行非标准操作的标准机制”。这种扩展支持是为实现者在现有版本的备忘录上“推动信封”而提供的。扩展属性是

contents.text: specified by property and/or property parameter names that have the prefix text of "X-" (the two character sequence: LATIN CAPITAL LETTER X character followed by the HYPEN-MINUS character). It is recommended that vendors concatenate onto this sentinel another short prefix text to identify the vendor. This will facilitate readability of the extensions and minimize possible collision of names between different vendors. User agents that support this content type are expected to be able to parse the extension properties and property parameters but can ignore them.
contents.zh-CHS: 由前缀文本为“X-”的属性和/或属性参数名称指定（两个字符序列：拉丁文大写字母X字符后跟HYPEN减号字符）。建议供应商将另一个短前缀文本连接到此sentinel上，以标识供应商。这将促进扩展的可读性，并最大限度地减少不同供应商之间可能的名称冲突。支持此内容类型的用户代理应该能够解析扩展属性和属性参数，但可以忽略它们。

contents.text: At present, there is no registration authority for names of extension properties and property parameters. The data type for this property is TEXT. Optionally, the data type can be any of the other valid data types.
contents.zh-CHS: 目前，没有扩展属性名称和属性参数的注册机构。此属性的数据类型为文本。或者，数据类型可以是任何其他有效的数据类型。

contents.text: Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text:
x-prop     = x-name *(";" xparam) [";" languageparam] ":" text CRLF
   ; Lines longer than 75 octets should be folded
Example: The following might be the ABC vendor's extension for an audio-clip form of subject property:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下可能是ABC供应商对主题属性的音频剪辑表单的扩展：

contents.text: X-ABC-MMSUBJ;X-ABC-MMSUBJTYPE=wave:http://load.noise.org/mysubj.wav
4.8.8.2 Request Status
Property Name: REQUEST-STATUS
contents.zh-CHS: 属性名称：请求状态

contents.text: Purpose: This property defines the status code returned for a scheduling request.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此属性定义为计划请求返回的状态代码。

contents.text: Value Type: TEXT
contents.zh-CHS: 值类型：文本

contents.text: Property Parameters: Non-standard and language property parameters can be specified on this property.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：可以在此属性上指定非标准和语言属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: The property can be specified in "VEVENT", "VTODO", "VJOURNAL" or "VFREEBUSY" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：该属性可以在“VEVENT”、“VTODO”、“VJOURNAL”或“VFREEBUSY”日历组件中指定。

contents.text: Description: This property is used to return status code information related to the processing of an associated iCalendar object. The data type for this property is TEXT.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：此属性用于返回与处理关联iCalendar对象相关的状态代码信息。此属性的数据类型为文本。

contents.text: The value consists of a short return status component, a longer return status description component, and optionally a status-specific data component. The components of the value are separated by the SEMICOLON character (US-ASCII decimal 59).
contents.zh-CHS: 该值由一个简短的返回状态组件、一个较长的返回状态描述组件和一个特定于状态的数据组件（可选）组成。值的组成部分由分号字符（US-ASCII十进制59）分隔。

contents.text: The short return status is a PERIOD character (US-ASCII decimal 46) separated 3-tuple of integers. For example, "3.1.1". The successive levels of integers provide for a successive level of status code granularity.
contents.zh-CHS: 短返回状态是一个以3元组整数分隔的句点字符（US-ASCII十进制46）。例如，“3.1.1”。连续级别的整数提供了连续级别的状态代码粒度。

contents.text: The following are initial classes for the return status code. Individual iCalendar object methods will define specific return status codes for these classes. In addition, other classes for the return status code may be defined using the registration process defined later in this memo.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是返回状态代码的初始类。个别iCalendar对象方法将为这些类定义特定的返回状态代码。此外，还可以使用本备忘录后面定义的注册流程定义退货状态代码的其他类。

contents.text:
|==============+===============================================|
| Short Return | Longer Return Status Description              |
| Status Code  |                                               |
|==============+===============================================|
|    1.xx      | Preliminary success. This class of status     |
|              | of status code indicates that the request has |
|              | request has been initially processed but that |
|              | completion is pending.                        |
|==============+===============================================|
|    2.xx      | Successful. This class of status code         |
|              | indicates that the request was completed      |
|              | successfuly. However, the exact status code   |
|              | can indicate that a fallback has been taken.  |
|==============+===============================================|
|    3.xx      | Client Error. This class of status code       |
|              | indicates that the request was not successful.|
|              | The error is the result of either a syntax or |
|              | a semantic error in the client formatted      |
|              | request. Request should not be retried until  |
|              | the condition in the request is corrected.    |
|==============+===============================================|
|    4.xx      | Scheduling Error. This class of status code   |
|              | indicates that the request was not successful.|
|              | Some sort of error occurred within the        |
|              | calendaring and scheduling service, not       |
|              | directly related to the request itself.       |
|==============+===============================================|
Format Definition: The property is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：属性由以下符号定义：

contents.text:
rstatus    = "REQUEST-STATUS" rstatparam ":"
             statcode ";" statdesc [";" extdata]
rstatparam = *(
; the following is optional, ; but MUST NOT occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；但不得超过一次

contents.text: (";" languageparm) /
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”语言参数）/

contents.text: ; the following is optional, ; and MAY occur more than once
contents.zh-CHS: ; 以下是可选的；并且可能不止一次发生

contents.text: (";" xparam)
contents.zh-CHS: （“；”xparam）

contents.text:
statcode   = 1*DIGIT *("." 1*DIGIT)
;Hierarchical, numeric return status code
statdesc = text ;Textual status description
contents.zh-CHS: statdesc=文本；文本状态描述

contents.text: extdata = text ;Textual exception data. For example, the offending property ;name and value or complete property line.
contents.zh-CHS: extdata=文本；文本异常数据。例如，违规财产；名称和值或完整的建筑红线。

contents.text: Example: The following are some possible examples of this property. The COMMA and SEMICOLON separator characters in the property value are BACKSLASH character escaped because they appear in a text value.
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：以下是此属性的一些可能示例。属性值中的逗号和分号分隔符是反斜杠字符转义的，因为它们出现在文本值中。

contents.text: REQUEST-STATUS:2.0;Success
contents.zh-CHS: 请求状态：2.0；成功

contents.text: REQUEST-STATUS:3.1;Invalid property value;DTSTART:96-Apr-01

REQUEST-STATUS:2.8; Success\, repeating event ignored. Scheduled
 as a single event.;RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY\;INTERVAL=2
REQUEST-STATUS:4.1;Event conflict. Date/time is busy.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求状态：4.1；事件冲突。日期/时间很忙。

contents.text:
REQUEST-STATUS:3.7;Invalid calendar user;ATTENDEE:
 MAILTO:jsmith@host.com
5 iCalendar Object Examples
contents.zh-CHS: 5个iCalendar对象示例

contents.text: The following examples are provided as an informational source of illustrative iCalendar objects consistent with this content type.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下示例作为与此内容类型一致的说明性iCalendar对象的信息源提供。

contents.text: The following example specifies a three-day conference that begins at 8:00 AM EDT, September 18, 1996 and end at 6:00 PM EDT, September 20, 1996.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下示例指定了一个为期三天的会议，从1996年9月18日美国东部夏令时上午8:00开始，到1996年9月20日美国东部夏令时下午6:00结束。

contents.text:

 Atlanta, Georgia END:VEVENT END:VCALENDAR

6 Recommended Practices
contents.zh-CHS: 6建议做法

contents.text: These recommended practices should be followed in order to assure consistent handling of the following cases for an iCalendar object.
contents.zh-CHS: 应遵循这些推荐做法，以确保对iCalendar对象的以下情况进行一致处理。

contents.text: 1. Content lines longer than 75 octets SHOULD be folded.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 长度超过75个八位字节的内容行应折叠。

contents.text: 2. A calendar entry with a "DTSTART" property but no "DTEND" property does not take up any time. It is intended to represent an event that is associated with a given calendar date and time of day, such as an anniversary. Since the event does not take up any time, it MUST NOT be used to record busy time no matter what the value for the "TRANSP" property.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 具有“DTSTART”属性但没有“DTEND”属性的日历条目不会占用任何时间。它旨在表示与给定日历日期和时间相关联的事件，例如周年纪念。由于事件不占用任何时间，因此无论“TRANSP”属性的值是多少，都不能使用它来记录繁忙时间。

contents.text: 3. When the "DTSTART" and "DTEND", for "VEVENT", "VJOURNAL" and "VFREEBUSY" calendar components, and "DTSTART" and "DUE", for "VTODO" calendar components, have the same value data type (e.g., DATE-TIME), they SHOULD specify values in the same time format (e.g., UTC time format).
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 当“VEVENT”、“VJOURNAL”和“VFREEBUSY”日历组件的“DTSTART”和“DTEND”以及“VTODO”日历组件的“DTSTART”和“DUE”具有相同的值数据类型（例如日期-时间）时，它们应以相同的时间格式（例如UTC时间格式）指定值。

contents.text: 4. When the combination of the "RRULE" and "RDATE" properties on an iCalendar object produces multiple instances having the same start date/time, they should be collapsed to, and considered as, a single instance.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 当iCalendar对象上的“RRULE”和“RDATE”属性组合生成具有相同开始日期/时间的多个实例时，它们应折叠为单个实例，并视为单个实例。

contents.text: 5. When a calendar user receives multiple requests for the same calendar component (e.g., REQUEST for a "VEVENT" calendar component) as a result of being on multiple mailing lists specified by "ATTENDEE" properties in the request, they SHOULD respond to only one of the requests. The calendar user SHOULD also specify (using the "MEMBER" parameter of the "ATTENDEE" property) which mailing list they are a member of.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 当日历用户由于在请求中的“与会者”属性指定的多个邮件列表中而收到对同一日历组件的多个请求（例如，对“VEVENT”日历组件的请求）时，他们应该只响应其中一个请求。日历用户还应指定（使用“ATTENDEE”属性的“MEMBER”参数）他们是哪个邮件列表的成员。

contents.text: 6. An implementation can truncate a "SUMMARY" property value to 255 characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 实现可以将“摘要”属性值截断为255个字符。

contents.text: 7. If seconds of the minute are not supported by an implementation, then a value of "00" SHOULD be specified for the seconds component in a time value.
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 如果实现不支持每分钟秒数，则应在时间值中为秒组件指定值“00”。

contents.text: 8. If the value type parameter (VALUE=) contains an unknown value type, it SHOULD be treated as TEXT.
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 如果值类型参数（value=）包含未知值类型，则应将其视为文本。

contents.text: 9. TZURL values SHOULD NOT be specified as a FILE URI type. This URI form can be useful within an organization, but is problematic in the Internet.
contents.zh-CHS: 9. TZURL值不应指定为文件URI类型。此URI表单在组织中可能很有用，但在Internet中存在问题。

contents.text: 10. Some possible English values for CATEGORIES property include "ANNIVERSARY", "APPOINTMENT", "BUSINESS", "EDUCATION", "HOLIDAY", "MEETING", "MISCELLANEOUS", "NON-WORKING HOURS", "NOT IN OFFICE", "PERSONAL", "PHONE CALL", "SICK DAY", "SPECIAL OCCASION", "TRAVEL", "VACATION". Categories can be specified in any registered language.
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 财产类别的一些可能英文值包括“周年”、“约会”、“商务”、“教育”、“假期”、“会议”、“杂项”、“非工作时间”、“不在办公室”、“私人”、“电话”、“病假”、“特殊场合”、“旅行”、“假期”。类别可以用任何注册语言指定。

contents.text: 11. Some possible English values for RESOURCES property include "CATERING", "CHAIRS", "COMPUTER PROJECTOR", "EASEL", "OVERHEAD PROJECTOR", "SPEAKER PHONE", "TABLE", "TV", "VCR", "VIDEO PHONE", "VEHICLE". Resources can be specified in any registered language.
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 资源物业的一些可能的英文价值包括“餐饮”、“椅子”、“电脑投影仪”、“画架”、“投影仪”、“扬声器电话”、“桌子”、“电视”、“录像机”、“视频电话”、“车辆”。可以用任何注册语言指定资源。

contents.text: 7 Registration of Content Type Elements
contents.zh-CHS: 7内容类型元素的注册

contents.text: This section provides the process for registration of MIME Calendaring and Scheduling Content Type iCalendar object methods and new or modified properties.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节提供注册MIME日历和调度内容类型iCalendar对象方法以及新的或修改的属性的过程。

contents.text: 7.1 Registration of New and Modified iCalendar Object Methods
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1 新的和修改的iCalendar对象方法的注册

contents.text: New MIME Calendaring and Scheduling Content Type iCalendar object methods are registered by the publication of an IETF Request for Comments (RFC). Changes to an iCalendar object method are registered by the publication of a revision of the RFC defining the method.
contents.zh-CHS: 新的MIME日历和调度内容类型iCalendar对象方法通过发布IETF注释请求（RFC）注册。对iCalendar对象方法的更改通过发布定义该方法的RFC修订版进行注册。

contents.text: 7.2 Registration of New Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2 新物业的注册

contents.text: This section defines procedures by which new properties or enumerated property values for the MIME Calendaring and Scheduling Content Type can be registered with the IANA. Non-IANA properties can be used by bilateral agreement, provided the associated properties names follow the "X-" convention.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了可以向IANA注册MIME日历和调度内容类型的新属性或枚举属性值的过程。非IANA物业可通过双边协议使用，前提是相关物业名称遵循“X-”约定。

contents.text: The procedures defined here are designed to allow public comment and review of new properties, while posing only a small impediment to the definition of new properties.
contents.zh-CHS: 此处定义的程序旨在允许公众评论和审查新财产，同时对新财产的定义造成一个小的障碍。

contents.text: Registration of a new property is accomplished by the following steps.
contents.zh-CHS: 新财产的登记通过以下步骤完成。

contents.text: 7.2.1 Define the property
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.1 定义属性

contents.text: A property is defined by completing the following template.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性是通过完成以下模板定义的。

contents.text: To: ietf-calendar@imc.org
contents.zh-CHS: 致：ietf-calendar@imc.org

contents.text: Subject: Registration of text/calendar MIME property XXX
contents.zh-CHS: 主题：文本/日历MIME属性XXX的注册

contents.text: Property name:
contents.zh-CHS: 物业名称：

contents.text: Property purpose:
contents.zh-CHS: 物业用途：

contents.text: Property value type(s):
contents.zh-CHS: 属性值类型：

contents.text: Property parameter (s):
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：

contents.text: Conformance:
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：

contents.text: Description:
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：

contents.text: Format definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：

contents.text: Examples:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text: The meaning of each field in the template is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 模板中每个字段的含义如下所示。

contents.text: Property name: The name of the property, as it will appear in the body of an text/calendar MIME Content-Type "property: value" line to the left of the colon ":".
contents.zh-CHS: Property name：属性的名称，它将出现在文本/日历MIME内容类型“Property:value”冒号左边的行“：”的主体中。

contents.text: Property purpose: The purpose of the property (e.g., to indicate a delegate for the event or to-do, etc.). Give a short but clear description.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性用途：属性的用途（例如，指示事件或待办事项的委托人等）。给出一个简短但清晰的描述。

contents.text: Property value type (s): Any of the valid value types for the property value needs to be specified. The default value type also needs to be specified. If a new value type is specified, it needs to be declared in this section.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性值类型：需要指定属性值的任何有效值类型。还需要指定默认值类型。如果指定了新的值类型，则需要在本节中声明它。

contents.text: Property parameter (s): Any of the valid property parameters for the property needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性参数：需要指定属性的任何有效属性参数。

contents.text: Conformance: The calendar components that the property can appear in needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 一致性：需要指定属性可以出现在其中的日历组件。

contents.text: Description: Any special notes about the property, how it is to be used, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：关于该物业的任何特别说明，如何使用等。

contents.text: Format definition: The ABNF for the property definition needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：需要指定属性定义的ABNF。

contents.text: Examples: One or more examples of instances of the property needs to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：需要指定属性实例的一个或多个示例。

contents.text: 7.2.2 Post the Property definition
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.2 发布属性定义

contents.text: The property description MUST be posted to the new property discussion list, ietf-calendar@imc.org.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性描述必须发布到新属性讨论列表ietf中-calendar@imc.org.

contents.text: 7.2.3 Allow a comment period
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.3 允许评论期

contents.text: Discussion on the new property MUST be allowed to take place on the list for a minimum of two weeks. Consensus MUST be reached on the property before proceeding to the next step.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须允许在名单上对新财产进行至少两周的讨论。在进行下一步之前，必须就财产达成共识。

contents.text: 7.2.4 Submit the property for approval
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.4 提交财产以供批准

contents.text: Once the two-week comment period has elapsed, and the proposer is convinced consensus has been reached on the property, the registration application should be submitted to the Method Reviewer for approval. The Method Reviewer is appointed to the Application Area Directors and can either accept or reject the property registration. An accepted registration should be passed on by the Method Reviewer to the IANA for inclusion in the official IANA method registry. The registration can be rejected for any of the following reasons. 1) Insufficient comment period; 2) Consensus not reached; 3) Technical deficiencies raised on the list or elsewhere have not been addressed. The Method Reviewer's decision to reject a property can be appealed by the proposer to the IESG, or the objections raised can be addressed by the proposer and the property resubmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦两周的评论期结束，且投标人确信已就物业达成共识，则应将注册申请提交给方法审查人批准。方法审查员被任命为申请区域主管，可以接受或拒绝财产登记。方法审核人应将已接受的注册信息传递给IANA，以纳入正式的IANA方法注册。注册可能因以下任何原因而被拒绝。1） 评论期不足；2） 未达成共识；3） 清单或其他地方提出的技术缺陷尚未得到解决。方法评审员拒绝财产的决定可由投标人向IESG提出上诉，或由投标人提出异议并重新提交财产。

contents.text: 7.3 Property Change Control
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3 属性更改控制

contents.text: Existing properties can be changed using the same process by which they were registered.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以使用注册现有属性的相同过程来更改现有属性。

contents.text: 1. Define the change
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 定义更改

contents.text: 2. Post the change
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 张贴更改

contents.text: 3. Allow a comment period
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 允许评论期

contents.text: 4. Submit the property for approval
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 提交财产以供批准

contents.text: Note that the original author or any other interested party can propose a change to an existing property, but that such changes should only be proposed when there are serious omissions or errors in the published memo. The Method Reviewer can object to a change if it is not backward compatible, but is not required to do so.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，原作者或任何其他利益相关方可以提出对现有财产的变更，但只有在发布的备忘录中存在严重遗漏或错误时，才应提出此类变更。如果更改不向后兼容，则方法审阅者可以对其提出反对，但不需要这样做。

contents.text: Property definitions can never be deleted from the IANA registry, but properties which are no longer believed to be useful can be declared OBSOLETE by a change to their "intended use" field.
contents.zh-CHS: 属性定义永远不能从IANA注册表中删除，但如果认为不再有用的属性可以通过更改其“预期用途”字段宣布为过时。
